body: Still coming back to this
instant fav. love this 10/10
My main gripe with this, aside from everything, is that the hottest hot sauce in the world is 9 Scoville units. This mf needs to update the doujin
I have no strong opinions on this, but the maids face throughout this whole this is basically my reaction.

What i like about mikoshiro honnin's work is that you solely focused on the torture and the sadism they put into it. The elaborate way of human torture is at its best. And you don't really have to focus on the waifus because the face couldn't get anymore generic than that. For the people who said the translator have a bad taste, i hope you get a second ball to face some of this shit
why my Brain and Dick really like this shit??

This is fucking AWFUL Why do I LOVE IT SO MUCH like dam I'd never want this to happen to me but I get off on reading this so hard?? Like?? Fuck?? God I wish that were me. No I don't!! Dammit!! Maybe if i keep rereading it I'll see why I like it so much... Brb..
This is HEAVILY cursed. But, whoever took time out of their lives to translate this, I applaud your nerves, because I can't stomach looking at this.

wtf man that's fucked up

jesus christ ouch

@Tamatama @nattv That's like saying it's fine that ecchi/harem anime get good adaptations while stuff like Berserk and Ajin will get trashy CGI. It's not even a subjective opinion, it's criticizing peoples choices by what is obviously better and worse. There's tons of better torture/body mod works out there that are still untranslated. @erihan That's fucking hilarious coming from a fujoshi. Go and schlick it to your trashy favorites.
I like how the person complaining about other peoples tastes loves the most generic shit ever
NICE!

some people are rude af. Thank you for translating.
If you don't like the work then just don't look at it. Imagine complaining about someone translating something you don't care about.
It's literally translated for FREE and this dude whine about it, ungrateful bastard indeed
The weirdest wank I ever had.....
Damn that's fucked... Can't wait for the next translation.
@vi6ddarkking It's just sad to see translations being wasted on trash like this when there's so much good stuff still untranslated.

@Schmand It's a hobby, any money I make with the translations comes from Patreon and SubscribeStar.
And as far as my tastes go, what can I say I'm Just a Sadist, besides don't you like some Cute BDSM Foxgirl Action?

@Championoflove The artstyle as a whole is terrible. The character designs are terrible. The body proportions and expressions are terrible. The torture is laughably bad and can't be taken serious. Innovative is not always a positive thing.

@Schmand Are you kidding me? Shit taste? Mikoshiro Honnin and Algolagnia series in general is one of the best hentai you will ever find. Such creative and innovative style is something specificaly unique to this media, and should be thankful for. Still, since it's so unorthodox it doesn't get translated as much as it deserves, and our hero here @vi6ddarkking should be appreciated for his translations, no matter if he's getting payed or not. Though I do highly speculate he isn't, after all this is a hentai site with no paywalls whatsoever, there are only ads and only the site's admin(s) recieve any kind of income from them.
@vi6darkking Serious question: Are you getting paid for the translations or do you just have shit taste?
